snippet.title: Outbreak Island - Official Gameplay Overview | Publisher Spotlight Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Here’s a fresh look at Outbreak Island, including gameplay, new mechanics, locations, and how you’ll spend some of your time by doing activities like farming, building, resource hunting, and more in this upcoming open-world sandbox survival horror game. In Outbreak Island, survive on a remote Island, where a mysterious Outbreak awakens bloodthirsty monsters at night. Craft, build, and defend your base in the brutal world. Outbreak Island will be available in 2023 on PC.

#IGN #SoG
